channel.title: [REQ] Cracked client for the newest Beta
channel.description: Well, as you may have heard, we will be upgrading to bukkit soon. I have no clue about using or finding the cracked clients, so I ask this of the community: can you find one for us so that when we do upgrade, people that do not have the paid version of Minecraft can still play?

item.title: [REQ] Cracked client for the newest Beta
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

[quote=“laurent 248, post:13, topic:382265”]If you like the game, then don’t crack it and give a reward to the producers…
BTW, I use a cracked one too…[/quote]
Fine print much?
A lot of people are not able to buy the full game, and other people’s parents are just not open about buying stuff over the internet. However, I will try to convince my parents to get it for me on my birthday.

Read full topic
item.source: [REQ] Cracked client for the newest Beta

item.title: [REQ] Cracked client for the newest Beta
item.dc:creator: @Jammydee Jammydee
item.description:
@Jammydee wrote:

On the essentials plugin topic, here are some interesting links for you to read over, it’s got over 50 commands:
see them here - http://ess.earth2me.com/index.php/Command_Reference

some more specific aspects of the essentials plugin can be found here - http://ess.earth2me.com/index.php/Install_Guide

and the actual topic for the plugin is here - http://forums.bukkit.org/threads/gen-essentials-v188-basics-nether-kits-homes-mail-permissions-support.1262/page-96#post-57264

when we go to bukkit i hope we get this plugin… it makes it a lot more like hey0 in terms of commands and doesn’t take a lot of getting used to or setting up…

Read full topic

item.title: [REQ] Cracked client for the newest Beta
item.dc:creator: @ollie123 Ollie123
item.description:
@ollie123 wrote:

If you want it to be as much like hey0 as possible then I would recommend the Essentials plugin.

http://ess.earth2me.com/index.php/Main_Page

It’s open source so you can modify it to fit your needs.

Read full topic

item.title: [REQ] Cracked client for the newest Beta
item.dc:creator: @xxx123xxx xxx123xxx
item.description:
@xxx123xxx wrote:

the current pre-release(idk right term for it) of bukkit supports 1.2_01, last time i ran the updater it was 1.2_02 so idk if they are going to update the server to go with the latest client revision or not :/, i have the 1.2_01 client files if you need them because Lilxcj’s updater will download the latest revision(1.2_02).

Read full topic
